summary: Maize, also called corn, is a type of grass that grows edible seeds. It was first grown by people in Mexico over 9,000 years ago. Today, it's a very important food around the world and is used to make many things, like food for animals, sugar, oil, and even fuel. Maize comes in different colors and is usually yellow or white. It needs people to help it spread and is grown everywhere. In 2020, over 1 billion tons of maize were produced. It's also used in many foods like tortillas and cornmeal.
title: Maize
